Question: This first became evidenced in 2004, when this person appeared in a TV advertisement for Victoria's Secret lingerie.
Hints: This person replied: "Well, I am a true believer.".
Later in that year, this person allowed a two-hour edit, dominated by the concert performances, to be more widely released.
Among those quoting this person were US Supreme Court Chief Justice John Roberts and Justice Antonin Scalia, both conservatives.
